mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (p_no,contents, regdate, rating) VALUES (#{p_no},#{contents}, date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'), #{rating})
mapper.select: SELECT r_no,r.rating, r.regdate, r.contents, r.p_no, p.nickname, p.title FROM (SELECT r_no, rating, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') regdate, image, contents, p_no FROM review ORDER BY r_no desc) as r INNER JOIN product as p ON r.p_no = p.p_no limit #{startNo}, 10
SELECT r_no,r.rating, r.regdate, r.contents, r.p_no, p.nickname, p.title FROM review as r INNER JOIN product as p ON r.p_no = p.p_no WHERE nickname=#{nickname} ORDER BY r_no desc
